ModMetaData.name: Make Early Components
ModMetaData.author: Sixdd
ModMetaData.description:
This mod allows you to create components out of Steel at a Smithy. The process is expensive early on but becomes much cheaper with the Component Assembly Table.
Components can be made at these workbenches Fueled Smithy for 50 each Electric Smithy for 25 each Component Assembly Table for 5 each
If used alongside my Organic Plasteel mod you can also make components out of Plastic!
